H0.text: To which species does the Gnu or Wildebeest belong. Bovidae

H1.text: To which species does the Gnu or Wildebeest belong. Equidae

H2.text: To which species does the Gnu or Wildebeest belong. Cervidae

H3.text: To which species does the Gnu or Wildebeest belong. ANTELOPE

A4.text: Bovidae is the biological family of cloven-hoofed, ruminant mammals that includes cattle, bison, buffalo, antelopes, and goat-antelopes such as sheep and goats.
